message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to part with it for $15,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm motivated to sell, $12,000 is a bit too low for me to accept. Could you do $13,500?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $13,000. Can you consider this offer?
